title: Essential safety measures
introduction: The frenulum is a small band connecting your glans to the inner foreskin surface. Some men with phimosis often have a slightly shorter frenulum which can be stretched using the method shown.

safetyTips.title: Use even pressure across the foreskin
Wash your hands before every exercise
Avoid forcing the foreskin to retract
Causing tears or cuts through overstretching
Take a break if the skin is irritated
Seek medical attention from a doctor
